device_token.description: Optional device token for push notifications

post.description: Authenticates a user with email and password. Returns a JWT token for subsequent API requests. Rate limited to 60 requests per minute.

device_token.description: Optional device token for push notifications

message.example: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.

post.description: Logs out the authenticated user and invalidates their JWT token. Requires valid authentication.
Assigns a role to a user. This endpoint is restricted to users with 'manager' role or higher. Available roles: manager, user, super_admin.

user_id.description: ID of the user to assign role to

role.description: Role to assign to the user

message.example: Unable to assign role to user
You do not have permission to assign roles

items.example: The specified user does not exist.

get.description: Retrieves a list of tasks. Results are filtered based on user role and permissions. Requires TASK_READ permission.

parameters.name: parent_task_id
parameters.description: Filter tasks by parent task ID

message.example: You do not have permission to read tasks

post.description: Creates a new task with optional child tasks. Requires TASK_CREATE permission.

message.example: You do not have permission to create tasks

get.description: Retrieves a single task by ID. Results are filtered based on user role and permissions. Requires TASK_READ permission.

403.description: Forbidden - Insufficient permissions or task not accessible

message.example: You do not have permission to view this task

put.description: Updates an existing task. Users with TASK_UPDATE permission can update all fields. Users with TASK_STATUS_UPDATE permission can only update status of tasks assigned to them.

403.description: Forbidden - Insufficient permissions or task not accessible

message.example: You are not authorized to update this task

delete.description: Deletes a task by ID. Requires TASK_DELETE permission.

message.example: You do not have permission to delete tasks

post.summary: Assign a task to a user
post.description: Assigns a task to a specific user. Requires TASK_ASSIGN permission.

assignee_id: The assignee id field is required.

message.example: You do not have permission to assign tasks
An error occurred while assigning the task

patch.description: Changes the status of a task. Users with TASK_UPDATE permission can change status of any task. Users with TASK_STATUS_UPDATE permission can only change status of tasks assigned to them.

403.description: Forbidden - Insufficient permissions or task not accessible

message.example: You are not authorized to change the status of this task
An error occurred while changing task status

post.description: Adds a child task to an existing parent task. Requires TASK_MANAGE_CHILDREN permission.

message.example: You do not have permission to manage child tasks
An error occurred while adding the child task

delete.description: Removes a child task from its parent. Requires TASK_MANAGE_CHILDREN permission.

message.example: You do not have permission to manage child tasks
An error occurred while removing the child task
